conflicts.description: lua-luajit: luajit not supported on MacOS, see lua-luajit-openresty
conflicts.name: arch=darwin-None-None

dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax
dependencies.name: curl

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: Unzip is a compression and file packaging/archive utility.
dependencies.name: unzip

dependencies.description:
GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP,
HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols. It is a non-
interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts,
cron jobs, terminals without X-Windows support, etc.
dependencies.name: wget

dependent_to.description:
LuaFileSystem is a Lua library developed to complement the set of
functions related to file systems offered by the standard Lua
distribution. LuaFileSystem offers a portable way to access the
underlying directory structure and file attributes. LuaFileSystem is
free software and uses the same license as Lua 5.1
dependent_to.name: lua-luafilesystem

dependent_to.description:
Dynamic function graph tracer for Linux which demangles C, C++ and Rust
calls
dependent_to.name: uftrace

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Fetcher to use in the LuaRocks package manager
variants.name: fetcher

variants.description: add symlinks to make lua-luajit a drop-in lua replacement
variants.name: lualinks
